name: Realistic Pencil Drawings
description: This class is designed for beginners who want to learn the basics of art. You will explore various techniques and mediums to develop your artistic skills.

name: The Colored Pencil Course
description: In this class, you will learn the fundamentals of figure drawing. Through a series of exercises and projects, you will improve your ability to accurately depict the human form.

name: The Pen & Ink Experience
description: Explore the beautiful world of watercolor painting in this class. You will learn various techniques, color mixing, and how to create stunning watercolor artworks.
